snippet.title: Bentley Bear's Crystal Quest - Atari 7800 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Captured via Atari 2600+

Originally released as a homebrew game via AtariAge in 2013, this 7800 sequel to Crystal Castles was given an official release by Atari in 2024, as part of the launch of the Atari 7800+, both separately and as a pack-in title.

#retrogames #retrogaming #atari #atari2600plus #atari7800 #theforeseenarcade #crystalcastles #bentleybear #bentleybearscrystalquest #atariplus
